name: The creamy dreamy skate adventure
description:
A work in progress game about the strange adventure of a girl and her skateboard. The spots are based on real-life skate-places of my country, Nicaragua, where i used to go

Right now is in alpha state, the main mecanics of the game are done (including the level editor, save your edited levels), it will include a "Free skate" mode and the "Story mode".

CONTROLS
  • Z : Ollie
  • X: Flips + Arrows to combo flips
  • UP: Push
  • Down: Break
  • UP or DOWN before landing to do MANUAL
  • Land in the edge or tubes to grind,rotate and press the arrows to extra awesome tricks(Rotate to inside while pressing UP to do Crooked grind)
  • P: PAUSE
  • Press the TOP-Right button to enter EDIT MODE
  • Click the Arrow icon to edit the placed objects
